00030         private void updateRolePermissionTable()
00031         {
00032             //used to update the role table entries
00033             //IRoleRepository roleRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRoleRepository>();
00034             IRolePermissionRepository rolePermRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRolePermissionRepository>();
00035 
00036             var query = from p in rolePermRepo.RolePermissions
00037                         select p;
00038 
00039             //clear existing roles, get a new list (in case any are added / deleted / changed)
00040             this.rolePermissionTable.Rows.Clear();
00041 
00042             this.rolePermissionTable.Rows.Add(titleRow);
00043 
00044             //for every role that is in the database, add it as a row in the table
00045             foreach (var rolePerm in query)
00046             {
00047                 //instantiate a new row
00048                 TableRow row = new TableRow();
00049                 row.CssClass = "orderRow";
00050 
00051                 bool canEdit = true;
00052                 bool canDelete = true;
00053 
00054 
00055                 TableCell cellEdit = new TableCell();
00056                 if (canEdit)
00057                 {
00058                     ImageButton edit = new ImageButton();
00059                     edit.ImageUrl = "/images/edit.gif";
00060                     edit.ToolTip = "Edit";
00061                     edit.CommandArgument = rolePerm.permissionID.ToString(); //user.userID.ToString();
00062                     edit.Command += new CommandEventHandler(btnEditRolePerm_Click);
00063                     cellEdit.Controls.Add(edit);
00064                 }
00065                 else
00066                 {
00067                     Image edit = new Image();
00068                     edit.ImageUrl = "/images/edit_gray.gif";
00069                     edit.ToolTip = "Edit";
00070                     cellEdit.Controls.Add(edit);
00071                 }
00072 
00073 
00074                 TableCell cellDelete = new TableCell();
00075                 if (canDelete)
00076                 {
00077                     ImageButton delete = new ImageButton();
00078                     delete.ImageUrl = "/images/delete.gif";
00079                     delete.ToolTip = "Delete";
00080                     delete.CommandArgument = rolePerm.permissionID.ToString(); //user.userID.ToString();
00081                     delete.Command += new CommandEventHandler(btnDeleteRolePerm_Click);
00082                     cellDelete.Controls.Add(delete);
00083                 }
00084                 else
00085                 {
00086                     Image delete = new Image();
00087                     delete.ImageUrl = "/images/delete_gray.gif";
00088                     delete.ToolTip = "Delete";
00089                     cellDelete.Controls.Add(delete);
00090                     cellDelete.Enabled = false;
00091                 }
00092 
00093                 TableCell permID = new TableCell();
00094                 permID.Text = rolePerm.permissionID.ToString();
00095 
00096                 TableCell roleName = new TableCell();
00097                 roleName.Text = rolePerm.Role.role_name.Trim();
00098 
00099                 TableCell objectDesc = new TableCell();
00100                 objectDesc.Text = rolePerm.@object.ToString();
00101 
00102                 TableCell objectUpdate = new TableCell();
00103                 objectUpdate.Text = rolePerm.obj_update.ToString();
00104 
00105                 TableCell objectView = new TableCell();
00106                 objectView.Text = rolePerm.obj_view.ToString();
00107 
00108                 TableCell objectCreate = new TableCell();
00109                 objectCreate.Text = rolePerm.obj_create.ToString();
00110 
00111                 TableCell objectDelete = new TableCell();
00112                 objectDelete.Text = rolePerm.obj_delete.ToString();
00113 
00114                 //add the row to the table
00115                 row.Cells.Add(cellEdit);
00116                 row.Cells.Add(cellDelete);
00117                 row.Cells.Add(permID);
00118                 row.Cells.Add(roleName);
00119                 row.Cells.Add(objectDesc);
00120                 row.Cells.Add(objectUpdate);
00121                 row.Cells.Add(objectView);
00122                 row.Cells.Add(objectCreate);
00123                 row.Cells.Add(objectDelete);
00124 
00125                 this.rolePermissionTable.Rows.Add(row);
00126             }
00127         }

00129         protected void btnEditRolePerm_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00130         {
00131             //get the permission ID as the command argument
00132             ImageButton btn = sender as ImageButton;
00133             int permissionID = Int32.Parse(btn.CommandArgument);
00134 
00135             //get the row to to show in the panel
00136             IRolePermissionRepository rolePermRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRolePermissionRepository>();
00137             var theQuery = from p in rolePermRepo.RolePermissions
00138                            where p.permissionID == permissionID
00139                            select p;
00140 
00141             //populate the panel text box
00142             foreach (var thePermission in theQuery)
00143             {
00144                 this.editRoleIDTextBox.Text = thePermission.roleID.ToString();
00145                 this.editObjectTextBox.Text = thePermission.@object.ToString();
00146                 this.editUpdateTextBox.Text = thePermission.obj_update.ToString();
00147                 this.editViewTextBox.Text = thePermission.obj_view.ToString();
00148                 this.editCreateTextBox.Text = thePermission.obj_create.ToString();
00149                 this.editDeleteTextBox.Text = thePermission.obj_delete.ToString();
00150 
00151                 this.editPermLabel.Text = permissionID.ToString();
00152             }
00153 
00154             //turn off the other panels and show the edit panel
00155             addPanel.Visible = false;
00156             editPanel.Visible = true;
00157             deletePanel.Visible = false;
00158         }

00191         protected void deleteSubmit_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00192         {
00193             try
00194             {
00195                 IRolePermissionRepository rolePermRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRolePermissionRepository>();
00196                 RolePermission deleteMe = rolePermRepo.GetById(int.Parse(deletePermLabel.Text));
00197 
00198                 rolePermRepo.DeleteRolePermission(deleteMe.permissionID);
00199 
00200                 rolePermRepo.SubmitChanges();
00201 
00202                 //return a validation message
00203                 errorLabel.Text = "Permission has been deleted";
00204                 errorLabel.Visible = true;
00205 
00206                 //hide the panel
00207                 deletePanel.Visible = false;
00208             }
00209             catch (Exception theException)
00210             {
00211                 //error message
00212                 errorLabel.Text = "Database error when deleting role permission";
00213                 errorLabel.Visible = true;
00214             }
00215 
00216             updateRolePermissionTable();
00217 
00218         }

00220         protected void addSubmit_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00221         {
00222             //check for nulls
00223             if ((String.IsNullOrEmpty(addRoleIDTextBox.Text)) ||
00224                 (String.IsNullOrEmpty(addObjectTextBox.Text)) ||
00225                 (String.IsNullOrEmpty(addUpdateTextBox.Text)) ||
00226                 (String.IsNullOrEmpty(addViewTextBox.Text)) ||
00227                 (String.IsNullOrEmpty(addCreateTextBox.Text)) ||
00228                 (String.IsNullOrEmpty(addDeleteTextBox.Text)))
00229             {
00230                 //return a error message
00231                 errorLabel.Text = "Please enter a valid value for all fields";
00232                 errorLabel.Visible = true;
00233             }
00234             else
00235             {
00236                 try
00237                 {
00238                     IRolePermissionRepository rolePermRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRolePermissionRepository>();
00239                     RolePermission addMe = new RolePermission();
00240 
00241                     addMe.obj_create = int.Parse(addCreateTextBox.Text);
00242                     addMe.obj_delete = int.Parse(addDeleteTextBox.Text);
00243                     addMe.obj_update = int.Parse(addUpdateTextBox.Text);
00244                     addMe.obj_view = int.Parse(addViewTextBox.Text);
00245                     addMe.@object = addObjectTextBox.Text;
00246                     addMe.roleID = int.Parse(addRoleIDTextBox.Text);
00247 
00248                     rolePermRepo.AddRolePermission(addMe);
00249 
00250                     rolePermRepo.SubmitChanges();
00251 
00252                     //return a validation message
00253                     errorLabel.Text = "New Permission has been added";
00254                     errorLabel.Visible = true;
00255 
00256                     //hide the panel
00257                     addPanel.Visible = false;
00258                 }
00259                 catch (Exception theException)
00260                 {
00261                     //error message
00262                     errorLabel.Text = "Database error when adding role permission";
00263                     errorLabel.Visible = true;
00264                 }
00265 
00266                 updateRolePermissionTable();
00267 
00268             }
00269         }
